AUTHOR: Twentysix, tweaks by Neurario
DESCRIPTION: Allows the creation of customizable triggers
NAME: Trigger
INSTALL_MSG:
`PLEASE NOTE TRIGGERS IN THIS VERSION CAN BE CREATED BY ANYONE. Only owners can set trigger influence.

[p]help trigger` for more info. `[p]help trigger set` for an explanation of the settings.
Triggers can be annoying. Be responsible and don't abuse them.
